turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you wanting to pick this one up from the location at 2808 Scottsville Rd?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I wanted it from the 710 Campbell Ln location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks at 710 Campbell Ln?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Espresso Con Panna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Espresso Con Panna? Would you like any extra flavors or toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I would like to have an extra pump of whipped cream on the top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Extra whipped cream? Added that to the order. What size would you like this drink to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a triple please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A triple Espresso Con Panna with extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This drink is available at the 710 Campbell Ln location and will be ready for you to pick up soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good to hear!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your reciept will be sent to you via text. You will need to show this when you pick up your drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I will look out for this.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anyhting else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
